name: Apply for Passport
description: Apply for a new passport, renewal, or replacement.
description_full: Apply for a new Georgian passport online or visit a local office. Process typically takes 5-10 business days. Required documents: valid ID, birth certificate, and application form.

name: Driver License Renewal
description: Renew your driver license online or in person.
description_full: Renew your driver license before expiration. Can be done online for most citizens. Visit your local office if you need a replacement due to loss or damage.

name: Pay Taxes Online
description: Pay income taxes, property taxes, and other government fees.
description_full: Secure online portal for paying all government taxes and fees. View your tax records, get payment plans, and receive official receipts immediately.

name: Register a Business
description: Register a new business or sole proprietorship.
description_full: Complete online business registration. Receive your business license within 24 hours. Support available for business planning and compliance requirements.

name: Apply for Social Benefits
description: Apply for unemployment, disability, or other benefits.
description_full: Apply for various social support programs. Check eligibility, view benefits calculator, track your application status, and receive direct support.

name: Register Birth Certificate
description: Register a newborn and obtain a birth certificate.
description_full: Register births within 30 days. Online application available with home delivery of certificate options. Free service for Georgian citizens.

name: Property Registration
description: Register property ownership or transfer property deed.
description_full: Register real estate property, update ownership records, or transfer property rights. Online submission with electronic notarization available.

name: Vehicle Registration
description: Register a vehicle or renew vehicle registration.
description_full: Register new vehicles, renew registration, or update vehicle information. Includes insurance verification and emission testing coordination.

name: School Enrollment
description_full: Online enrollment for public schools. Find schools near you, check available programs, and complete registration. Multilingual support available.

name: University Admission
description: Apply for admission to Georgian universities.
description_full: Online application portal for higher education institutions. View program offerings, submit applications, and track admission status.
